name: Legacy of the Blizzard
description:
Nicole Express' entry into the 2016 #LOWREZJAM. A 64x64 window into the world of Mirra, who tries to save the country from the evil Queen who has placed a blizzard upon the world. Enjoy!

Features:

  • Pseudo-3D map screens in three stages
  • Platform stages with a variety of enemies
  • Gameplay based around building blocks on screen
  • Not actually very much like Legacy of the Wizard
